title: PiXel ScaLer

form.original-pixel-size-hint: Specify the size of 1 pixel for pre-scaled images
form.input-file-area: Select or drag & drop an image (gif/jpeg/png)

ogp-description: An app to resize pixel art into illustration style.

scale.invalid-image-size: The pixel size ({originalPixelSize}px) does not match the image size

what-is.heading: What is this
steps: This is a scaling app using xBRjs that can easily convert pixel art into illustration style.
You can use the converted pixel art freely for personal or commercial use within the bounds of good conscience.

usage.heading: How to use
steps: Select or drag & drop pixel art to add it.
Set the scale factor (100%-10000%) in the input field.
If enlarging original pixel art, set "pixel" to 1; if enlarging already enlarged art, enter the number matching the prior enlargement ratio.
An illustration-style enlarged image will appear.
Click the download or ZIP download button under the image to save it.

tips.heading: Tips
steps: Best results come from converting original-size pixel art.
Low-resolution images (non-pixel art) wonâ€™t upscale cleanly.
Set the scale factor to 100% to apply anti-aliasing to pixel art.
Conversion may fail if the specified pixel size does not match the pixel size in the image.
